title: Major Explorer Kit
desc: This kit contains a combination of Arts & Crafts and Aeromodelling activities. It accelerates the creative skill and acts as a stress buster. This kit assists in acquiring hand-eye co-ordination and fine motor skills and improves focus and concentration on trivial details.
include: Coroplast Glider Kit, Balsa wood Glider Kit, Keychain Kit, Canvas Key Holder Kit
